/usr/bin/cc   -rdynamic CMakeFiles/example-command-with-opts.dir/examples/example-command-with-opts.c.o  -o example-command-with-opts -Wl,-rpath,/root/yyz/mongo-c-driver-1.11.0/cmake-build/src/libmongoc:/root/yyz/mongo-c-driver-1.11.0/cmake-build/src/libbson libmongoc-1.0.so.0.0.0 -lrt -lresolv ../libbson/libbson-1.0.so.0.0.0 -lrt -lm -pthread
